description.value: You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Prescient Consumable] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Prescient Planner] feats, except that you always withdraw the objects from your cheek pouches. This means the object you retrieve must fit in your cheek pouches; this is generally an item of negligible Bulk unless you also have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cheek Pouches] feat.
